title: Common human fungus found to worsen melanoma aggressiveness
desc: Cancer is one of the causes responsible for the most deaths worldwide; in 2020, for example, it resulted in ten million deaths. It has been estimated that micro-organism infections caused between 13-18% of these cases.

title: World cancer day 2026: Pathologist lists common symptoms of cancer people often ignore
desc: Today February 4 is World Cancer Day. Doctors warn that many early cancer signs are overlooked as stress or ageing. Recognising persistent, unexplained changes in the body can lead to earlier diagnosis, better treatment outcomes, and lives saved.

title: 7 dogs competing for Westminster's show big prize
desc: The Westminster Kennel Club is getting ready to crown its top dog. After two days, 2,500 dogs and more than 200 breeds, it will come down to seven canines vying Tuesday night for U.S. show dogs’ most coveted prize.
